Text: LNG discussionKevin Harvey Harmon can be reached at I am not sure if he is willing to speak at the LNG conference but it is worth a shot As indicated before my schedule is such that I could not commit to a speaking engagement Hope all is well Stephen Stephen C Harris Vice President El Paso Louisiana Street Houston TX USA email Phone Cell Fax This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
